welcome_message_body: Welcome to Niihama, Japan! Get ready to experience the charm of our city known for its beautiful cherry blossoms, traditional festivals, and vibrant local culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Niihama has to offer.

restaurants.name: HAGINOCHAYA (宗家 萩の茶屋)
restaurants.description: HAGINOCHAYA (宗家 萩の茶屋) is a soba restaurant located in 新居浜市.
restaurants.address: 繁本町7-8, 新居浜市, 愛媛県, 792-0023
